text: Aur kafiron kay aemaal misil uss chamakti hui rait kay hain jo chatyal maidan mein ho jissay piyasa shaks door say pani samjhta hai lekin jab uss kay pass phonchta hai to ussay kuch bhi nahi pata haan Allah ko apnay pass pata hai jo uss ka hisab poora poora chuka deta hai. Allah boht jald hisab ker denay wala hai
